tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE construction_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_materials (
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_materials (
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE material_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE material_inventory (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY(supplier_id) REFERENCES material_suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_materials (
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_used INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY(project_id, material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES project_details(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(material_id) REFERENCES material_inventory(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_costs (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_cost DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    labor_cost DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES project_details(project_id)
);
